Introduction
This topic contains information on the monthly monetary allowance, including
levels of monthly allowance payable for spina bifida and other covered birth defects
, and
Chapter 18
beneficiaries under age 18
, and
incompetent beneficiaries
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Chapter 18 Benefits Information
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
